jobs.title: Senior React Developer

jobs.title: Frontend Developer (React)
jobs.how_to_apply: Security clearance required. Apply through DoD portal.
jobs.description: About the job Coolshop is a UX-centered digital solution provider focused on creating effective extended sales processes. Born in 2010, we leverage the Italian world-renowned talents in creativity and design, writing cutting-edge code to provide great B2B and B2C applications. Proudly from Torino, now in Rotterdam, Chicago, and Dubai. We are looking for a Frontend Developer (React) for our Turin branch.The mission is to develop tools that improve the way our customers work and interact with our products and services.The mission is to develop tools that improve the way our customers work and interact with our products and services.
